document_data.name: Worvil Forkbeard
document_data.mainbody: '''Worvil Forkbeard''', mostly known only as the '''Weevil''', was a notorious criminal in [[Ten Towns]] sometime after the [[War of the Silver Marches]].
document_data.History: In the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]], Worvil led a bandit group that raided caravans heading north to the mines of [[Mirabar]]. The [[Order of the Gauntlet]] captured most of the bandits but the Weevil escaped. Sir [[Baric Nylef]] of the Gauntlet searched for him in [[Bryn Shander]]. Worvil in fact was hiding at [[Xantharl's Keep]] in the [[Savage Frontier]], posing as a stable hand at the [[Falling Orc]] inn.
